title: A Geek in Japan (2010)
description:
----------------------
A Geek in Japan (2010)
----------------------

TITLE: A Geek in Japan: Discovering the Land of Manga, Anime, Zen, and the Tea Ceremony
AUTHOR: Hector GarcÃƒÂ­a
YEAR: 2010
LANGUAGE: English
FORMAT: PDF, ePub & Mobi

SYNOPSIS: A Geek in Japan is a hip, smart and concise guide to Japan. Spotlighting the originality and creativity of the Japanese, debunking myths about them, and answering nagging questions like why they're so fond of robots. This inspired, insightful and highly informative guide was designed to appeal to the generations of Westerners who grew up on Pokemon, manga and video games.
